message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $120. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. How about we meet in the middle at $105? This price reflects the true value of the product.
I'm still a bit above my budget at $105. Would you be willing to go down to $95?
